name: bootie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short boot that covers only the foot and ankle: They sell a range of flat and heeled booties. She was wearing an expensive-looking black dress and shiny gray booties. Synonym
ankle boot
a baby's
bootee : I'm knitting some booties.
heibaihui/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesTo accentuate your height, wear a pair of suede booties with heels. With her diamond-studded collar and designer booties, Chloe quickly catches the attention of everyone in the room.The four men were dressed in orange survival suits and had rubber booties on their feet.I noticed a dropped baby bootie on the ground.
